title: Top oil companies to be quizzed on climate change
content: A US congressional hearing will examine whether oil companies misled the public about climate change.
en_title: Top oil companies to be quizzed on climate change
en_content: A US congressional hearing will examine whether oil companies misled the public about climate change.

title: Top oil companies to be quizzed on climate change
content: A US congressional hearing will examine whether oil companies misled the public about climate change.
en_title: Top oil companies to be quizzed on climate change
en_content: A US congressional hearing will examine whether oil companies misled the public about climate change.

title: Moscow shops and restaurants shut in new lockdown
content: Russia closes non-essential services and sends workers home amid record Covid deaths.
en_title: Moscow shops and restaurants shut in new lockdown
en_content: Russia closes non-essential services and sends workers home amid record Covid deaths.

title: Poll shows rising demand for climate action
content: Ahead of COP26, a BBC World Service poll finds growing support for strong political leadership.
en_title: Poll shows rising demand for climate action
en_content: Ahead of COP26, a BBC World Service poll finds growing support for strong political leadership.

title: Film-maker who exposed East Timor massacre dies
content: Max Stahl went from children's TV host to award-winning film-maker and East Timor national hero.
en_title: Film-maker who exposed East Timor massacre dies
en_content: Max Stahl went from children's TV host to award-winning film-maker and East Timor national hero.

title: DNA confirms man is Sitting Bull's great-grandson
content: A sample of the Native American leader's hair confirms the identity of his great-grandson.
en_title: DNA confirms man is Sitting Bull's great-grandson
en_content: A sample of the Native American leader's hair confirms the identity of his great-grandson.

title: US issues first gender-neutral 'X' passport
content: The document has an "X" in the gender box, to show the holder does not identify as male or female.
en_content: The document has an "X" in the gender box, to show the holder does not identify as male or female.

title: Hundreds of sea turtles wash up dead in Mexico
content: Scientists think the turtles may have become tangled in abandoned fishing nets and drowned.
en_title: Hundreds of sea turtles wash up dead in Mexico
en_content: Scientists think the turtles may have become tangled in abandoned fishing nets and drowned.
